title: How to tell if my PC supports Bluetooth - Quora

response.answer_text: Check your device manager and see if there is a Bluetooth adapter. You can also see if your settings has a Bluetooth toggle. Intel and AMD combine their Bluetooth module with their networking module, so if your computer can connect to the internet (like most computers), it will probably have Bluetooth. Even if it isn't combined, Bluetooth is a very common feature on computers.

The best way is to open Device Manager and then go to “Network Adapters” and see if anything starting with Bluetooth Device is there. The simplest way to open Device Manager in windows is to Click on Start menu, and type: Device Manager. You can also press Win+Pause keys and then select Device Manager.
